actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of potential water resource developments in the upper Canadian River Basin.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of potential water resource developments in the upper Canadian River Basin in Colfax County, New Mexico, and vicinity.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of potential water resource developments in the upper Canadian River Basin.
